resources.string: "Jetpack Compose is a modern toolkit for creating native Android UI." "Compose simplifies and accelerates UI development on Android with less code," "Powerful tools and intuitive Kotlin APIs."

"In this tutorial, you create a simple UI component with declarative functions." "You call Compose functions to tell it what elements you want and the Compose compiler" " does the rest. Compose is built around Composable functions. " "These functions allow you to define the user interface of your application" "programmatically because they allow you to describe what it should look like and provide data dependencies," "instead of focusing on the UI building process, like bootstrapping" " an element and attach it to a parent. To create a Composable function," " add the @Composable annotation to the function name."
